body.p:
Feliciana Ky
June 7th 1861
Hon B Magoffin
Gov Com of Ky
Sir

I wish you to send me the necessary quantity of 'Hardee's Tactic' for the enrolled Malitia of Hickman Co Ky. Direct to me at "Morses Station O & N. O. R. R. Graves Co Ky via Lousiville Ky via Paducah Ky"

In the absence of Col Edward Crossland the entire command of the rigiment devolves upon me & part of the officers Elect in this command refuse to take the oath to support the "constitution of the U S & constitution of Ky_" I wish you to give me the necessary instruction ^how^ to proceed in that case

Maj J. C. Hawlet
Act Col Enrolled Malitia
Hickman Co Ky
